name: VRV
description:
⧸ Style for vrv.co ⧸

When watching any video it's always so unbearably small, this style fixes that! Also hides the header/menu bar.

* If the size is off, you can mess with the height in the advance style settings below.
The default is what fits my screen.
additional_info:
When you encounter bugs or issues, please report them as No rating or OK in the discussions.
I will do all I can to solve the problem to the best of my ability!

Change Log

  1. Bug Fix 1.1.3
    • Fix: now using a regex for the apply to all of site option. Should keep it from applying to the accounts page and messing with site functionality.
    • Fix: no longer has some elements float above the header.
  2. Update 1.1
    • Fix: minor functionality issues, mostly just appearance-wise.

DISCLAIMER

Just for fair warning.
  1. This style was created in google chrome, as it's my browser of choice. Whether or not this style is compatible with other browsers is a mystery to me.
  2. My overall knowledge of coding is limited — this is just a hobby I picked up recently — so most of my styles are created by trail and error.
With that all in mind, I hope you can all be patient with me, I assure you, I am doing my best!
